text: Jonathan Edward Schell (August 21, 1943 - March 25, 2014) was an American writer. He was also a visiting fellow at Yale University. He is best known for campaigning against nuclear weapons. He was born in New York City, New York. Schell died from cancer on March 25, 2014 at his home in the New York City borough of Brooklyn. He was 70 years old. ==References== ==Other websites== * Jonathan Schell at the Yale Center for the Study of Globalization Category:1943 births Category:2014 deaths Category:American activists Category:American war correspondents Category:American essayists Category:Writers from New York City Category:Academics from New York City Category:Anti-nuclear activists
title: Jonathan Schell
